game.name: The Blue Cut Hook
game.shortDescription: The Blue Cut Hook blends cozy tavern management with subtle adventure. You're no hero, just a humble tavern keeper, but your food, gear, and advice quietly shape the adventurers who pass through. They make the choices, take the glory, and face the danger, but your influence might keeps them alive.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Blue Cut Hook blends cozy tavern management with subtle adventure. You're no hero, just a humble tavern keeper, but your food, gear, and advice quietly shape the adventurers who pass through. They make the choices, take the glory, and face the danger, but your influence might keeps them alive.
